english.segment5: Heard the wind was just a whisper
english.segment6: of greatness to know and to be
english.segment9: Searching for help I give up
english.segment11: Yet a slight relief of gladness I sing
english.segment12: Lost between this love and despair
english.segment15: He stands in white we all fall to the wind
english.segment17: Wont you let me know how long ill bleed
english.segment18: And a thought to harvest all my pain
english.segment20: Id rather feel lost between this love and despair
